body:
Hi, 

I am just wondering if you guys could make a narrow WW2 trenches map or something. Just the idea of a flat terrain muddy map sounds awesome to me. If its could be like at the start everyone just charges. Also it would be pretty cool if there was a entirely new gamemode. The point of the gamemode, everyone charges and no respawning. Last standing team wins. Let me know what you guys think. 


Kind Regards ExShot

title: New Trenches WW2 Map
